reviews.text: Brand new hotel, very modern in the "new city section" of Changzhou. First class in every respect. Furnishings and woodwork very elegant, better than almost all US hotels. Clean modern bathroom with large walk in shower, clean marble floors. High speed internet in room. Exapansive, gourmet breakfast buffet. Top tier hotel, surprise in the middle of China. You wont go wrong. The only reason I can think not to stay is if you have business on the other side of the City [location], but taxi's are cheap, so go for the plush hotel.
reviews.title: Five Star, First Class, New and Modern

reviews.text: The Traders Hotel group is a division of the Shangri La Hotel group and I was not disappointed in the appearance of the hotel.
reviews.title: Traders Fudu

reviews.text: Room size and decor were very nice.
reviews.title: Oasis in Changzhou
